mapper.select: SELECT t.task_id, t.project_id, t.title, t.description, t.creation_time, t.deadline, t.creator_id, t.status, u.user_name, u1.user_name AS assign_name FROM task t INNER JOIN user u ON t.creator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN task_assign ta ON t.task_id = ta.task_id LEFT JOIN user u1 ON ta.assigner_id = u1.user_id WHERE t.project_id = #{projectId}
